div.p: Work with a Zillow partner agent
Leverage their expertise and Zillow's premium Showcase listings to get your home seen by more buyers.
Get your home in front of millions of buyers by listing it on Zillow.
Take full control of how buyers see your home on Zillow by listing For Sale by Owner (FSBO).

div.div:
Sponsor Sale – No Board Approval
Welcome to Apartment 15D at 200 East 58th Street — a beautifully renovated flex 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom residence in a full-service building. This bright and airy home boasts brand new finishes throughout, including sleek hardwood floors, modern HVAC units, and an in-unit washer and dryer for ultimate convenience. With open north and west exposures, natural light fills the space all day long.
Residents of 200 East 58th Street enjoy an array of amenities, including a fully equipped gym, a beautifully landscaped roof deck with sweeping city views, a live-in superintendent, and a 24-hour doorman. Situated in the heart of Midtown East, you’ll have easy access to world-class shopping, dining, and transportation.

div.aria-label: MLS information

li.span: Community features: Doorman, Full Time Doorman
Amenities included: Laundry, Fitness Center, Elevator(s)

div.p: Zillow Group is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for individuals with disabilities. We are continuously working to improve the accessibility of our web experience for everyone, and we welcome feedback and accommodation requests. If you wish to report an issue or seek an accommodation, please let us know.

Zillow, Inc. holds real estate brokerage licenses in multiple states. Zillow (Canada), Inc. holds real estate brokerage licenses in multiple provinces.
This site is not authorized by the New York State Department of Financial Services. No mortgage solicitation activity or loan applications for properties located in the state of New York can be facilitated through this site.
